viable_candidates.name: International Labour Organization (ILO)
viable_candidates.notes: UN agency -- authoritative global employment and social trends data. Fills Social gap.

viable_candidates.name: ScienceDaily
viable_candidates.notes: Science news aggregator -- broad STEEPs coverage. Excellent for interdisciplinary signals.

viable_candidates.name: Longevity Technology
viable_candidates.notes: Specialized longevity/anti-aging news. Frontier domain with ethical implications.

non_viable_candidates.name: Space.com
non_viable_candidates.notes: Overlaps heavily with existing NASA Climate Change source. Viable but redundant for T category.
